unnormalised: ᱱõge, mãchõ hãge-bhãge, chaasa sãhãkte rõpõrõhãñ.
normalised: Henda ho gãteko, calon do bis-dawai bãrebon ropora. Bharat reyea jãhãege khetiharea, Punjab khon Tamil Nadu dhãbic do, unko do adi rorok teko bãdaea. Apnar do mahina-mahina horo-hakar do jãhãm jo-jamaea, sin-sangi hasu-husu te ho jo-jomaea, ar dhã-dhã! Hende-kãkua do Delhi baha-bapla re an-huing dãka-ñama hẽcko lekage do ko hẽcgea, joto-gema nasaw laging. Ontege do bis-dawai botol do adi adi bes ñelok kan tahena, mone do chahera, haina?

normalised: Pidhi khon pidhi dhãbic do, bis-dawai do horo-hakar jo-jomko, fungi ar jhaṛ-jhuri hãtaw laging do ekdomge ek-numbar hãtiar kana. Noa do kheti-badi reyea 'Brahmastra' lekage monepea, enge en jãhãe apnar maha-puran reyea sarhẽc hãtiar, en jãhãe. Noa do apnar horo-hakar do bãcaw eda, horo-joma do baṛhaW eda, ar apnar jiyon-jati do surakhiya eda. Haryana renge mit farmer, Mr. Sharma do ñelabon kathaW adea, un do bis-dawai do thik samay re lagaW do jogaW do, bar hajar ar ba’is sal reyea uniyea joto dhiri horo do bãcaw ket’a, ekdom bes-bes brown planthopper maran hãtaW khon. Un do menket’a, "pañc hajar taka bis-dawai do en do pañcas hajar taka nuksan khon bãcaw adina. Sahaj hãsap!"

Metege do noa kana, gãteko. Jãhãnak adi sakat hãtiar lekage, bis-dawai do sanman ar saWdhani te hãtaw-hatawi laging do darkar kana. Adi bar-ti-ti lagaw do, na lagaw thik-thak te bañ lagaw do do maran doyek nuksan hoyok dãṛeaW. ParistaWran uparteyea asar do chintaWpea – hãsa, dã, ar jãhãe baW-bhãW-wiko baha reyea ras jo-jomko, unkoreyea asar ho. Abow do abowaa khet do rasayan rasta-ghata re do bañbon badlaW sanãW, haina? Ar abowaa saWstaW do do? Abow do bharosa do darkar kana jãhãe horo-joma do abow bon jo-jamaea, en do joto hor laging surakhiya hoyok-a, Kendriya Vidyalaya renge honko khon abowaa disom reyea maran-burhi dhãbic.

Ontege do Pusa reyea Indian Agricultural Research Institute (I A R I) renge bigyaniko do heWc kanako. Unko do tinak do nayã, surakhiya ar thik-thak bis-dawai jo-jom laging do non-stop ko kãmi kana. Unko do Integrated Pest Management (I P M) ran-niti ho ko bãṛhaW eda, jãhãe do bis-dawai lagaw do komaw laging do do binãW-binãW horo-joma hãtaw-hatawi do saWgiyaw eda. Horogaṛo badlaw-badlaw, ondeyea sãw-bhawik jomko lagaw (ladybugs do apnar gãteko kana!), ar maran hãtaW-hãtaw khon bãcaw horo-hakar kismko jo-jomko lekage do chintaWpea.

Noa do bis-dawai do ekdomge do bañbon hataW chadaW, en do thik-thak te lagaw laging kana. Label reyea jãhãe dosage do lekhaW adea, en do anwaW laging do adi darkar kana. Bis-dawai do thik samay re lagaw do, jemon sin-saWgel uWdaw khon aWga-aWgi choy bajaW re na horo-jo nam jãhãe bhala kãmi eda unkoko do nuksan khon bãcaw laging aWgi beṛha do lagaw do, en do adi maran doyek pharak hoyok-a. Ar jãhãege, jãhãege do hath-khora ar muh-mask lekage do surakhiya saWj-sarjom do baW-baW.

Ludhiana reyea Punjab Agricultural University do bis-dawai parbandhan bãreyea anusandhan ar siksha laging do ar mit maran kendra kana. Unko do khetihareko laging do regular workshop ar seminar ko lagaw eda, unkoko do surakhiya te lagaw thik-thak te ar binãW-binãW maran hataW-hataw ran-niti bãreyea ko paWrhaw eda. My kusin, Priya do janwari das tarikh, bar hajar ar te’is sal re do mit onka workshop reyea bhagiyat’a, ar nim ar binãW-binãW sãw-bhawik joma khon hoyok bio-pesticides bãreyea do adi ko sikhiyat’a.

Akhir re do, bis-dawai do jimmawari te lagaw do joto horiyea jimmawari kana. Khetihareko, anusandhaniko, ar niti-nirmataoko do joto horiyea saWgiyaW hoyok do darkar kana, Bharat reyea kheti-badi laging do mit dinak ar saWstaW bhabisya do surakhiya laging. Menagepea, august pandra tarikh, bar hajar ar chobbis sal re do, calon do mit hãriyar, surakhiya Bharat laging do kãsam bon hãtaw, mit-mit khet te. Purana hor do dahaka-dahak kãmi akana, metege do badlaw laging do samay hoy akana!
